description: Rear garden:T1 - Mimosa - Fell to ground level and remove all arisings, Grind out stump 30cm below ground level.T2 - Olive (Olea europaea) Fell to ground level and remove all arisings. Grind out stump 30cm below ground level.T3 - Bay (Laurus nobilis)	 - Lightly reduce by 1-1.5m to shape and contain (photos on quote 6214)	T4 - Ash (Fraxinus excelsior) -Reduce crown to the most recent reduction points, removing approx. 2-3m of new growth. Final height 10m and final overall spread 6m (photos on quote 6214)T5 - Strawberry Tree (Arbutus unedo) - Fell to ground level and remove all arisings. Grind out stump 30cm below ground level.	T6 - Chinese privet (Ligustrum lucidum) - Reduce on building side by removing specific limbs, as agreed with client (photos on quote 6214)	T7 - Loquat	- Lightly reduce by 1-1.5m to shape and contain (photos on quote 6214)
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
